anytime: I am in the right place at the right time, doing the right thing. -Louise Hay
Conscious breathing is my anchor. -Thich Nhat Hanh
May this moment of possibility be a risk filled invitation to pour ourselves into the heat of curiosity, mischief, celebration and delight. -Margo Rinehart
Spirit of love and mystery; help us to recognize the spark of the divine that resides within each of us. -Andrew Pakula
And when your eyes freeze behind the grey window and the ghost of loss gets into you, may a flock of colors... come to awaken in you a meadow of delight... -John O'Donahue
And forget not that the earth delights to feel your bare feet and the winds long to play with your hair. -Khalil Gibran
Walk as if you are kissing the Earth with your feet. -Thich Nhat Hanh
Impermanence is a principle of harmony. When we don't struggle against it, we are in harmony with reality. -Pema Chödrön
The present moment is filled with joy and happiness. If you are attentive, you will see it. -Thich Nhat Hanh
Feelings come and go like clouds in a windy sky. Conscious breathing is my anchor. -Thich Nhat Hanh
Let the soft animal of your body love what it loves. -Mary Oliver
You are imperfect, you are wired for struggle, but you are worthy of love and belonging. -Brené Brown
Authenticity is a collection of choices that we have to make every day. It's about the choice to show up and be real. -Brené Brown
The dark does not destroy the light; it defines it. It's our fear of the dark that casts our joy into the shadows. -Brené Brown
There is no innovation and creativity without failure. Period. -Brené Brown
Talk to yourself like you would to someone you love. -Brené Brown
Whoever you are, no matter how lonely, the world offers itself to your imagination. -Mary Oliver
Breath is the bridge which connects life to consciousness, which unites your body to your thoughts. -Thich Nhat Hanh
Letting go gives us freedom, and freedom is the only condition for happiness. -Thich Nhat Hanh
Life is available only in the present moment. -Thich Nhat Hanh
Keeping your body healthy is an expression of gratitude to the whole cosmos—the trees, the clouds, everything. -Thich Nhat Hanh
The most precious gift we can offer anyone is our attention. -Thich Nhat Hanh
morning: You are loved just for being who you are, just for existing. -Ram Dass
Courage starts with showing up and letting ourselves be seen. -Brené Brown
Open your heart and drink in this glorious day. -Heather Harvelesky

I rise in the morning torn between the desire 
 To save the world or to savor it—to serve life or to enjoy it; -Richard S. Gilbert
I promise myself that I will enjoy every minute of the day that is given me to live. -Thich Nhat Hanh
The present moment is the only time over which we have dominion. -Thich Nhat Hanh
I don't have to chase extraordinary moments to find happiness – it's right in front of me if I'm paying attention and practicing gratitude. -Brené Brown
What is it you plan to do with your one wild and precious life? -Mary Oliver
Smile, breathe and go slowly. -Thich Nhat Hanh
afternoon: Nothing can dim the light that shines from within. -Maya Angelou
The perfect moment is this one. -Jon Kabat-Zinn
You must do the things you think you cannot do. -Eleanor Roosevelt
Sometimes the bravest and most important thing you can do is just show up. -Brené Brown
There is no way to happiness – happiness is the way. -Thich Nhat Hanh
People have a hard time letting go of their suffering. Out of a fear of the unknown, they prefer suffering that is familiar. -Thich Nhat Hanh
Want to be happy? Stop trying to be perfect. -Brené Brown
To be beautiful means to be yourself. You don't need to be accepted by others. You need to accept yourself. -Thich Nhat Hanh
evening: I'm giving you permission to root for yourself and while you're at it root for those around you, too. -Mindy Kaling
We must accept finite disappointment, but never lose infinite hope. -Martin Luther King Jr.
Your life is already a miracle of chance waiting for you to shape its destiny. -Toni Morrison
Owning our story can be hard but not nearly as difficult as spending our lives running from it. -Brené Brown
Only when we are brave enough to explore the darkness will we discover the infinite power of our light. -Brené Brown
Tell me about despair, yours, and I will tell you mine. Meanwhile the world goes on. -Mary Oliver
At the end of the day, at the end of the week, at the end of my life, I want to say I contributed more than I criticized. -Brené Brown
My actions are my only true belongings. I cannot escape the consequences of my actions. -Thich Nhat Hanh
